title: The great web font debate on Hacker News
content:
[http://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=572730](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419120035/http:/news.ycombinator.com/item?id=572730)

Here's your chance to speak to a few people not in the choir.
author: billy_

comments.content: And this is why I’ll be releasing my next font through MyFonts, with per-sever web embedding (@font-face and SIFR) licenses available at half the cost of a per-desktop license.
